entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yarmouth Airport 7:53 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 1.7°C
Wind: NNE 19 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Drizzle. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Drizzle or rain showers changing to periods of snow near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023
